amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase the Transportation Security account by $5 million offset by reductions of $2.5 million each in the accounts for the Office of the Under Secretary for Management and the Office of Transportation Threat Assessment and Credentialing.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in the Congressional Record to increase the surface transportation account by $5 million. This amount is offset by reductions of $2.5 million each in the accounts for the Office of the Under Secretary for Management and for the development and implementation of screening programs of the Office of Transportation Threat Assessment and Credentialing.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
